p: The PCR products were cloned and subsequently sequenced at the VIB (Flemish Institute for Biotechnology) Genetic Service Facility at the University of Antwerp, using the ABI PRISM BigDye TM Terminator cycle-sequencing kit and an Applied Biosystems 3,730 DNA Analyzer. Sequencing data for the 10 Hyalomma ticks revealed that nine were H. rufipes and one was H. marginatum( 16).
